Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: fits in small places
Easy to set up with high end feature with a low end price. The multiple ink cartridges in color and black (3 plus 1) is a pleasant surprise in that it adds longer cartridge life overall (as opposed to an all in one color cartridge). The features are easy to use with the enhanced touch screen mini control panel) and the copy speed is surprisingly quick in the economical mode. The wireless capability is certainly an enhancement that everyone should have to enjoy.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design
Cons: Pictures quality bad
Ink cartriges that come with printer are 1/4 full. Once I installed new cartriges there were lines across every photo printed about 1/2 inch apart, horizonally. Called HP tech support, they will send special cartrige for another $50.00 and keep sending them as needed depending on use. Tech said most people don't notice this defect, or are willing to upgrade to another HP model. I'm upgradeing to EPSON.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Compact Design; Durable construction; Reliable
The touchpad on this is easy to use - very user friendly. It has some terrific features that are easy to access. Set up was generally easy, although if you aren't technically savvy I recommend that you stick to using a USB cable (not included). Getting onto our home wireless network so that we had full use of the printer (for apps, etc) was a bit of a challenge. We were *only* able to do that because we are comfortable getting deep into the setup of this thing - the instructions were too basic to be of any help.
Regarding other comments that this unit is noisy - it is no more noisy than any other ink jet printer that we've had. If you want a quieter printer, you'll probably have to get a (more expensive) laser ... printer. You get what you pay for, after all, and for a home printer, this is a terrific unit and at a very reasonable price. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Scans easily; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Compact Design
Cons: Doesn't handle card stock
Works well for most of my needs. I'm keeping my old, higher resolution scanner for old photos but for everyday copies this all-in-one is great. I print a lot in draft mode to save ink and the text quality is good enough to use for routine correspondence. The duplex printing feature has been working very well.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: A very decent product at the cost.
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Great Print Quality; Easy To Use
This is a darn good product at the cost. Works great with an IPAD. Easy setup althougth the the paper intructions are extremely poor. I've had very good history with HP printers and this is no different. Please note that I've only had this product for a week. Please note that the HP Photosmart 5510e is the same product but does not have the capabily to print on two sides but generally sells for $20.00 less. This product is a no brainer. I am buying a second printer as a gift. Do some research as the cost can vary among sellers.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: ok printer as far as printing goes
Item.Review:
Pros: reasonable price
Cons: very difficult to setup to work on a home network
bought this to replace photosmart Cg303. This machine is not nearly as good. Tried to connect to my home network and even my computer specialist cousin worked for 3 hrs and still could not get it to work wirelessly on my network. Since it had no ethernet connection was not able to do it that way. Finally had to forgo the network and connect to one computer via USB cable. In replacing the former printer I actually went backwards. Next time I would pay more and get the better printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Very nice home office document printer.
Item.Review:
Pros: Small size, easy to set-up and use, automatic 2-sided printing, auto-off feature.
Cons: Noisy printer when being used, but not a big issue for me.
I have only recently installed this printer (connected to my computer by USB cable). I have not used the wireless feature (yet), and I have not scanned or copied any documents (yet). The set-up was relatively easy, the ink cartridges (4 total) were very easy to install, and I have had no issues with document printing. I REALLY LIKE the automatic two-sided printing feature ! So far, I am very happy with my purchase, especially for the price: $89.99 + tax. And delivery was fast and FREE ! : )

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States

Easy to install and set-up. the paper catcher is not the best design;but it works.Love the wireless and ePrint features.If you need a simple printer this is the best value for the money.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: I am on my second Photosmart 5514. The first was DOA, it didn't print black ( did print the other 3 colors ). I returned it and got another. On the second, I followed the setup, got the printer on the wireless network, and everything appeared fine, there were no errors during the setup procedures. However, a print job from my PC would fail, couldn't connect to the printer. I ended up calling tech support. The tech had to make changes on my PC ( Windows 7 ) to get it to work. Specifically he had to change a port setting to be the IP address of my printer instead of the serial number of the printer. The tech went right to this, and admitted it was a known problem he'd seen before. Kudos to the tech, but it shouldn't be like that, it should just work right out of the box. It's not as if I hav ... e an unusual setup here, I'm running Windows 7 on an HP laptop. I am a very tech savvy person, an experienced software engineer, but I wasted many frustrating hours trying to get the Photosmart to work before calling tech support. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: I bought this printer for the air print feature so I could print from my iPad2, that works fine. The only real problem for me was setting up the wireless. Maybe it was because I have a duel band router, but I could not set it up with the WPS feature, it kept timeing out. When I tried to connect manually It kept telling me my pass phrase was wrong. Which I knew was not right as I have a laptop and iPad that work fine with that pass phrase. I changed the pass phrase in the router to one without numbers and it worked great after that. Maybe it's the way my system is setup and not a fault of the printer. That only took a few minutes. The printer is very fast and the print quality excellent. I actaully does photos better than my dedicated photo printer. Great buy for the ... price and I will be buying another one for my son. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Fast Operation
I bought this printer mostly for the "air print" feature so I could print from my iPad2. That works as advertised. The print quality for pictures is actually better than my dedicated photo printer. The text is excellent. I had problems setting up the wireless and eprint. The WPS wouldn't work at all, but I think that was because I have a duel band router. Ended up changing the passphrase in my router to one without numbers and it connected manually, fine. Guess this printer doesn't like numbers in the passphrase. Overall I am very satisfied with this printer and will be buying one for my son.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: Product is a good product for the price and function. I purchased it to specifically work with my iPhones and iPads. Initial setup did not work for iDevices. ePrint worked fine from iDevice products, however, that was not what I wanted to have happen. Many tries and much web site reading allowed me to finally find the answer. The answer was located in a footnote on the product data sheet indicating that the router had to be configured to match the mode ( g or n) of the router which the iDevices. Router was set for dual modes. Once I found this footnote (in small print in the 'pdf' document) I was able to reconfigure the router and the iDevices would find and recognize the 5514 and print to it. This should be called out specifically in the setup documentation to save the buyer frustration.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: Impressive product. Easy to setup in wireless format. Easy to establish a email address for the printer. Copy and scan features work well. Only complaint is that the paper ejects on top of the paper tray and a cheap arm needs to be extended to catch the paper. This arm is vulnerable to being broken as it is in the way and vulnerable to being stepped upon since the printer in my setup is kept at the bottom of my workstation. Otherwise, a very nice product.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: This printer was very easy to set up and use right out of the box. The instructions are easy to read and you are up and running in no time. We especially like that it has the e-print feature, which was also very easy to set up and use. Great product - the only thing that keeps it from being excellent is the print delay time, which isn't bad, but not excellent! Good product with great value.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time
have not had good luck the last few years with printers. especially the ones that were supposed to be wireless. this is the first one that actually works in a wireless network. that's the most exciting thing. don't know how long the ink lasts yet. it's smaller than all the others I've had which is a good thing. So far, so good!!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
This is a great at-home computer for homework as well as photos. It was an easy set up, printed reasonably fast. My only con was that the ink runs out pretty quickly. Need to order larger capacity cartridges which can get expensive since you have to order 4 (3 color, 1 black).

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Very Prone to paper Jams. Not to user f
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design
Cons: Hard To Use; Jams Easily; Too much ink used
Not user friendly - Scanning is not explained at all well. Paper Jams are very frequent .

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Easy To Use
Thought twice because of the ngative reviews on here. Glad I bought it! Very easy to set up and works with Vista and XP OS's. Wireless works great. Likes the 20 lb paper, no hang ups or jams.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Noisy
Great printer. Fits in compact space, but does the job well. Lots of features. Ink cartridges are reasonably priced. Very easy to set up and use.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Works great but makes a lot of noise.
Item.Review:
Pros: wireless printing
Cons: noisy
I like the touch screen. Printer was easy to set-up. Great printer for the price. But, my daughter studies late and when she prints it wakes us up.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: "Printer with a purpose, well worth it"!
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
I'm very satisfied for it serves my purpose. I bought it at the right time when it was on sale at Staples and I was quite amazed that the ink (black and color) came with the printer. I had my dell printer for almost 6 years basically just for printing, and the ink consumption was costly...and this probably holds true with most printers. However, this product is worth buying for.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
Bought it so I could print from my i-Pod Touch. Being a non-tech person, it was surprisingly easy to set up and sooo easy to use. At the sale price, it was an excellent buy for a dependable name brand.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: I purchased a HP printer in Dec. 2011 only to find out in April 2012 that particular printer is no longer made so there was no support. I was really upset until the gentleman I spoke to told me he could give me a deal on a better printer than the one I had originally purchased. I listened to what he had to say, made my decision to purchase another printer and I'm so glad I did. I've been very satisifed with this one and it's so easy to set up and use. I've not had any problems so far and I don't expect to any time soon. It was even better when I was told there would be free shipping for my new printer to be delivered to my front door.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Have yet to get it to work
Item.Review:
Cons: Hard To Use; With my HP computer; Can't get it to coordinat; Hard Setup
I've had this item for over 2 months and have yet to use it. It absolutly refuses to print either by wireless or by USB connection. However it prints nicely from it's own internal computer. So, in fact, this is not a review. I will send in one in the event I ever figure out the glitch.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Durable construction; Reliable; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Set Up
bought this for family member as gift! It was a breeze to set up and is very user friendly. The e-print was a plus.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Great picture quality; Enlarges and reduce; Set up pretty easy; Simple to use
Cons: Makes to much noice
Photo color is awesome. Lov enlarge/reduce option Easy to use, but noicey. Sound it is grinding corn when the carriage moves about. Get us to it tho I am very pleased. Alway like HP anyway.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Use; Low Ink Consumption; Fast Print Time; Durable construction; Easy To Set Up; Reliable
I HAVE HAD A LOT OF DIFFERENT PRINTERS SINCE MY FIRST COMPUTER (DOS). THE HP PHOTO SMART IS BY FAR THE BEST. IT MAKES BEAUTIFUL COLOR PRINTS... HAS A GREAT SCANNER... IT CAN BE REACHED WITH ALL OF MY COMPUTERS WITHOUT CABLES,.... CAN BE USED FROM ANY INNERNET LOCATION... AND IS EFFICIENT AND EASY TO USE. WIRELESS IS GREAT....

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Fast Print Time; Easy To Use
Never had a wireless printer before, but so far, this seems to work as intended. Prints fast enough for personal use, and I like the ink replacement method.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Reliable; Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Quiet; Easy To Set Up
My 4th printer in 5 years & FINALLY FOUND A GEM! Even being mechanically & computer illiterate, I can successfully operate it with ease. My church news letters, personal business cards & thank you notes NEVER LOOKED SO GOOD!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality
Cons: Noisy
The imbedded instructions are real nice. When I originally read in the reviews that this unit was noisy, I didn't think much of that. Well, the unit IS noisy when initializing, but that is offset by the crisp copy and all of its features. My last HP printer lasted 10 years, we will see how this one measures up. And the old one is up for sale, it works fine. It was just time for something new and wireless. I made a good choice and the price was right.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Wireless; Reliable; Color; Speed; Easy To Use; Smart Phone Compatible
Cons: Noisy
This printer was on sale for [$], $20 more than the other model since this one can do double-sided prints. For the money, it is awesome! Easy set up out of the box, easy set up for wireless, and great quality! The only down side is starting up is somewhat loud and sounds like things are cranking around, but I heard this is normal with this printer and not to worry. I got this for my father whom is finally getting technologically updated, and he finds this very easy to use! If you buy this, buy photo print paper as well, the quality of photos is great! 4 stars instead of 5 because of the noise factor, but for [$] you can't find any better ... . expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Noisy
I really like this printer. Compact, nice design. Easy to set up and works like a charm.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Quiet; Great Print Quality
Very easy to set up. Prints great both color and black. Pribts fast. And love the touch screen.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Reliable; Quiet; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality; Easy To Use
Cons: Jams Easily
I have been very pleased after just a few days. I was so happy with the ease of setting up. I had just spent 3 hours online with a technician trying to setup another brand of printer which I had purchased. After 3 hours I gave up and boxed it up and took it back to the store and then went to Staples and purchased this printer. So much easier.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Reliable; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Slow Operation
Upgraded this printer from a previous HP printer. Love the wireless capabilites and double sided printing. Also, individual ink cartridges. Hoping to save on buying ink.. Prints a little slow but so did my other printer so no big problem.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
This was my 2nd HP All In One Printer. I purchased a new computer and was forced to buy a new printer since HP did not update software to use with Windows 7 with my perfectly running older printer which is now considered obsolete by HP. I am not happy about this and if HP continues in the future not to upgrade software for newer PC's, this will be my last HP printer that I will buy.
The printer itself is a very good buy for the money. It was easy to set up and easy to install the software. I am not technically savvy and have had no problems with it. The wireless is wonderful.
I have only used it for (2) weeks, but have no complaints as of yet and I am giving HP another chance to keep my business.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Quality Construction
This Printer 5514 e-all in one has more features. It is easy to install this printer to my computer and it works very well. But if you want to save a lot of money, you would buy Hp 5510. HP 5510 has lower price and same features i bought this printer because there was discount on it.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice size for small area; Quality Construction; Easy to Use
Cons: A tad noisy
We had someone set this up for us as we are very technically challenged. So far we like the quality of our copies. It is a bit noisy, but it is fast, so that's great. Made nice clear copies, prints nicely. Many we saw were really very large for our small work space. This is compact and seems solid, well designed.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: This printer takes a long time to wake up and print, I have not used a wireless printer in the past, but I doubt that creates the delay. Several times I have hit the print function again only later to have more copies than I want when the printed page(s) come out. Otherwise easy to setup and get to run. Nothing too elaborate in the printing.....same as in past printers I have owned. I have only used it for several weeks. It is certainly noisier than past printers that I have used.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use
Cons: Difficult To Set Up; Inefficient; Flimsy Construction
There is much to like and dislike about the HP Photosmart 5514 printer. The window on the printer does give good instructions on how to insert cartridges, setup for printing, scanning. The overall construction is flimsy, when turning it on it sounds like the cartridges are hitting against the inside of the machine, very noisy when turning on and when printing. I keep wondering if I got the lemon printer and I am the only one with these complaints.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: While I think this is a good purchase at $90 the colors are a little off and there's no tray to catch the printed pages. The scan to computer works like a champ. Works great with an iPad. I haven't tried printing remotely using ePrint yet.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: This is a really nice printer and I got it for a really nice price. I love how easy it was to setup and connect with my MacBook Pro, iPad and iPhone. My only dislike is how loud it is when starting to print. Overall a good printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Can't say enough good about this printer
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy to Use; Efficient
This printer has great wireless capabilities and has a great price on the ink cartridges. The paper instructions were easy to follow and I had the printer installed and working wirelessly on 5 laptops in less than 20 minutes. Our family cannot say enough good about this printer. A GREAT purchase at a GREAT price! Very much recommended. You cannot go wrong with this HP printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Flimsy Construction; VERY NOISY
While the printer was easy to set-up and use, it is very noisy and cheap feeling. When you get ready to print it goes through quite a commotion trying to get ready...lots of bangs and clangs and grinds! I gave my last hp printer away because I was so unhappy with it. I let the salesperson talk me into trying another one. I quickly returned this one. HP customer service is pretty much non-existent. Don't buy one!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: The 5514 is simple to install (wireless) and operate. The only problem I encountered during installation was with the help application. For some reason it wouldn't install on two of the three computers being used. This didn't stop the printer from working on all three computers. The print speed and quality is excellent.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: This review may be a bit premature as I have some issues that need to be resolved. Issue resolution would change my rating. The printer arrived on schedule and was easy to setup, I was quickly connected to my home wireless network and successfully printed over a dozen pages. I tried to enable eprint but had a problem connecting to the website due to an account issue. Last night the printer started to jam on about every third page printed. This is the issue I need to resolve. I'll get a new ream of HP paper and see if that helps, otherwise I will return the product.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: A good printer, for the price.
Item.Review: Printer arrived on time. other reviewers have said this printer is hard to install, some hired a pro. to do it. If you read the INSTRUCTIONS that come with the printer, then you will have it easy. As CptDent said, you are the one that makes it difficult. " It can't be that easy" , but it is. printer does have a little noise but nothing you can't live with. Prints great documents, not printed any pics yet , so will let you know when i do. All in all, a good printer for the price, easy to set up, finds wirelees network on it's own, and your ready to print. I'm a 64 year old from Maryland, not all that computer savy, but can hang with the Intermediate users any time. If you want a good printer this is it. Just don't think it's harder then it looks. It's not. Remember (KISS) KEEP IT SIMP ... LE STUPID, I did and now printing with the best of them. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Efficient; Reliable
Cons: Paper holder is flimsy
This printer will do so much more once I get a wireless connection. I am somewhat computer illiterate, so set-up took me longer than most people , I'm sure. Ink is much more reasonably priced-had a Dell printer and ink is cost prohibitive!!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Perfect for Mobile Apple Products & PCs
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Fast Operation; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Noisy
I love this printer. It is my first wireless printer and it works from any room in the house with any of my PC or mobile Apple devices. It was very easy to set up and register with HP.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Compact, efficient, but a bit noisey
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design
Cons: Noisy; Hard Setup
It would be better if your set-up books containced more complete info....... The info. on ink usage and what they best work on??

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: Had it for 3 weeks now and, so far, no paper jam or false "out of paper" messages. It replaces my previous printer, scanner, and copier thus freeing up space. Initially, I could not get the computer and the printer to work together. This problem was solved by HP's tech support and now everything just "humms" along.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless printer is fairly easy to set up.
Cons: Jams easily
This printer jams harder and more often that the Grateful Dead ever did. After some coaxing it will finally print and then the quality of that print is fine. The apps are interesting, although the apps you can use are limited on this model and not particularly useful. Wireless printing was easy to set up, aside from one little hiccup where the computer cannot actually find the printer. This problem was not hard to work around, however.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: Had our professional computer guy come to set up the printer when I couldn't make it work; $150 of his labor to tell me the printer is defective. The paper jams every time it prints wasting paper, ink not to mention the cost of the printer and postage to return it. We ended up buying an HP Officejet Pro 8600 which seems to work like a charm.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up and great print quality. Works from my desktop, laptop and even my tablet.
Cons: So far all is good.
I wasn't looking for a new printer but saw this and decided it would be great because I can ePrint using Asus Transformer tablet. It took a little to set that up, but pretty easy even for a non-tech-type person. I like it's quiet operation, it's quality printing, it's ability to print on both sides of the page, and touch screen operation. It also fits really well in my small computer desk.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: good printer. does make a lot of extra noise.
Item.Review:
Pros: wireless, nice print job. easy to set up
Cons: makes some internal noises
Overall- does a nice job. easy to set up, not got the multi picture scanning figured out but the wireless feature is very nice.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Does a great job for simple printing.
Item.Review:
Pros: Responds quickly, and prints documents well.
Cons: The noise that it makes getting ready to print and after the completion of the printing.
The HP is a good choice for home printing-mostly just everyday printing, school projects, and less sophisticated printing jobs. It is reasonably priced and easy to change the ink cartridges and reload the paper tray.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Low Ink Consumption; Reliable; Compact Design; Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Noisy when first starting up, but it a inkjet printer they all make noise. You can print on both sides of paper, which saves money, love the wireless capibitities and the indiviual ink system, saves on ink, just replacing what color your out of. love the touchscreen, very easy to use.Love HP, my last HP printer lasted 9 years, won't buy anything else.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: A great product at a great price. Totally brainless hookup and function. We 70+s appreciate the ease of use and the easy access. Thanks for a good deal and a good deal more.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: quality print, easy options
Cons: too noisy
I rate this product as a 4 on scale of 1-5. Do not use frequently so its fine for me. Would not recommend for heavy use. Very good for the price.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: I am pleased with the great deal I got on this printer... All the functions I need (and even some I don't really need) are there and working properly... Set-up was fast and it all went to work the way it is supposed to... It fits perfectly it the designated spot for it & looks great next to the rest of my HP equipment... No doubt it lets you know it is working with the bone grinding sounds that emit from its interior !!... lol... But as long as it is healthy I will just assume that it's the sounds of it's digestive system at work !!...

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: So far we are very happy with this printer. The setup was easier than I anticipated from experience with printers in the past. It prints plenty fast for us and the double sided printing is a big plus. Some features could be a little more substantial, but overall it is a very good printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Cons: Hard Setup; Flimsy Construction
Have only had the printer a little over a month, prints well but is very noisy , this is my third HP printer, it is the cheapest made, the noisiest and hardest to set up. Instructions difficult to follow, I am not a computer whiz, my last wireless printer was easier to set up

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use
Cons: Paper Tray is small
This works well and is shared with my office partner. We both use it with our PCs and our iPhones and iPad. Nice product.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: I haven't used it a lot since I purchased it' but I really like the compact size. It takes up so little room. I do plan to put it to work a lot around the holidays when I make cards and calendars. I like the HP products that I have purchased.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: My operating system is Ubuntu 12.04, the printer came very quickly and I did the setup and Ubuntu found it right away and everything worked. The only problems I am having is threr is the scanner does not work wiyh xsane (the equlivlent to twane in windows) it will scan in a stand alone scanner program. You need you're printers to scan in xsane because half of the world uses linux. I have had no luck printing envelopes. The printer is very quiet.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: Nice printer that can print documents that are emailed to it and from the web, which I'm still trying to learn. Have the eprint app on my android phone but haven't figured that out yet, but I mainly just need to print wirelessly from my house, so I can just email a doc to it and it prints. It's rather noisy and the paper feed tray doesn't close with paper loaded. Can't scan directly to a usb, only an SD card can be used. Minor gripes, but overall a decent value.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
Cons: Flimsy Construction
I wish it had a better sheet catcher. My older HP models were built more solid. But it is working great and I have it set up wirelessly and all three computers in my home are using it. I have no major complaints so far and have had it over a month now.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: Small and light, this little printer connects wirelessly to your iPad or iPhone for automatic printing, even two-sided duplex. Individual CMYK ink cartridges -- make sure you buy the XL jumbo size for best economy.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Wireless; Compact Design; Reliable
Cons: Takes time to get ready; Doesn't include USBcord; MAKES NOISE
The printer is wireless, but if you don't have wi-fi, you'll need a USB cord. When I purchased this printer from the store itself, there was no USB included. The printer is really easy to set up. The booklet doesn't really talk about how to set it up. It says to remove all packaging, plug in the power cord, and turn on. Then it says the touch screen on the printer will say the rest of the instructions and it did. The instructions are simple and they include "Show Me" videos which show how to put in ink, paper, etc. The software disc is also easy to install. The instructions are straight forward. Some of the informa ... tion you need to know is in the booklet though. Scanning is also simpler than I thought. Overall, this is a wonderful printer and I'm glad I purchased it:) expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: I'm still new to the printer. I love how easy it was to setup and use from smart phones and iPads on the network. I tried to print a 4x6 and chose "best" for the quality and there were horizontal lines that weren't colored quite right as if the ink needed to go over them one more time. Wouldn't want to frame a print like that. Maybe I just need new ink but it doesn't seem to be notifying me of low ink...

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Low Ink Consumption; Durable construction; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Reliable
Cons: Noisy; Large Footprint
I was hesitant to replace my stand-alone printer with this at-the-time-unreviewed all in one.After much research,I decided that sizewise,this was my best option.Then it was on sale at Staples,for less than the printer I was also looking at.It is very noisy,especially on starting,but,I'm awake anyway.Printing is simple & fast,even with color.I'm concerned that the scanner has limited adjustments,as I scan a lot of artwork & resolution is fixed. I am hoping that my old scanner survives a good long while for that.For other apps,it's great-very fast & easy to use with the selection screen.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: I wanted a second printer as a back up. I was looking for a simple,easy to use printer that still had the ability to scan and copy off of the flat glass. No USB cord necessary if you have a wireless router. Also includes a built in duplex that can do two sided copies. Most of these duplexes stick out of the back of printers adding the extra bulk. Well if this is something that you are looking for, this printer is it. It's not at all bulky like my larger 6500a office jet all-in-one fax copier (although a very good machine), unless you really need an automatic feeder (another moving part that could go wrong). This is the printer. With the ease of scaning into your computer, who really needs fax. The scanning feature is seamless which is done right from your desktop. I am a very satisfied ... customer who has always relied on HP printers for all my needs. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Do not know as it has never worked
Cons: will not maintain network connection
This printer will not maintain a network connection with my Airport Extreme. I have run the setup at least 5 times. Sometimes the network appears, sometimes not. If the printer shows it is connected to the network it will not print or will for some reason disconnect from the network. I have used other HP products with Airport and have had no problems but this printer will not work.

To be able to print no matter if I'm using my laptop or netbook, or my husband is using his laptop to a printer in a common area of the home is great. Highly recommend for day to day use- and to have it at such a low price......fabulous!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: I was calling in to Customer Service with a problem on a 15-yr old HP printer that never gave me a problem before. But the Service Rep offered me an alternative while still on the Phone; & 5 days later, I was the proud new owner of the 5514 All-In-One Printer/Scaner/Copier! This product has FAR-exceeded my expectations in the first week of operation, & I like it much better than the former HP device that it replaced.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: Delivery was quick. Set up was very easy. So far very satisfied with this purchase and the price could not be beat. Has all the features I was looking for as I shopped for a printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: We bought this printer for a decent price and it actually does more than what we need it to do. The biggest downside is that it makes a really horrible grinding, clunking sound when operating, making it sound cheap and like it's about to break.. In fact, we were wondering if this was a defective machine and considered returning it to the store. After reading some reviews, it seems to be something a few others have experienced as well. It's pretty slow, too. Luckily we don't use it all that much otherwise I would definitely retun it.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
I've had this printer for about two weeks now and it's pretty okay for the money. I mostly got this to replace my old bulky, space-consuming all-in-one to free up much needed space. All I really wanted was the scanner and copier features.The 5514 fits right where I needed it to, and it works great - most of the time. My only complaint is that when I tried to copy some docs for court, paper kept getting jammed while loading, five sheets to be exact; so it's not very reliable as a printer. Thankfully I have a laserjet as well.
Other than that, I had no problem setting it up, loading the software or getting my PC to detect it. It scans great, print quality is nice when it prints, and the touch-screen feature is nice - no more overloaded panel of buttons for each features offered. The e ... ase of navigation is quite simple also. If only HP could get the paper-jam problem worked out this would be an excellent printer to recommend. All-in-all, I'm keeping it because it soes do exactly what I need it to, and fits in the small space I need it to.
My recommendation, if you want a really good all-in-one printer, spend the additinal money for something nicer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: Overall I'm satisfied with purchase. Unfair to talk about durability as I've only owned printer for two weeks. If you don't use wi-fi you'll need to purchase a printer wire.

Luckily it is very easy to remove a paper jam, but just need to make sure there is plenty of paper present. I could also be doing something wrong. I didn't take much time to read the instructions. I am a student and needed a printer to use ASAP and don't really have time to sit down and read the instruction book.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: After a ton of researching different machines, I purchased one of these for my boyfriend who is in school, and shortly after I purchased one for myself. Albeit this can be a little louding during a cycle-through, set-up was simple, all the functions I've used work well, and I really enjoy the double-sided printing feature. I've yet to try the e-print, but it's a great idea. I've always been a fan of HP products, and the 5514 continues to keep me one. Do all of the set-up of the printer prior to connecting it to the computer, as suggested, and you're golden. Great, easy to use, wireless printer that suites many needs.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States

So far it is perfect. I am anxious to start printing and scanning photos but haven't yet. It wasn't expensive for what I wanted it for.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: Impressive printer! Does good job of printing documents and great job of photo printing/copying. The unit is a little noisy while preparing for use, but for what it does in quality I can put up with it. Hooking up to WiFi was simple and no hitches in doing that but if your main computer (desktop pc) on the network is hard wired you will lose all capability of scanning a document or photo from the printer to the PC. Your WiFi connections from your laptop will scan due to the WiFi requirements. Scanning is a must for me so I had to puchase USB WiFi for my PC. (This is not a big expense anymore so no problem). One thing you will have to do if you do this though, you will have to disconnect your hardwired cable (network cable) and reinstall your HP software to accomplish this. Other than this ... issue on my network it works great and enjoying the features that this printer offers at a great price. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: So far the prints have been excellent. I had some trouble getting it to recognize my wireless laptop, and after about 5 hours of fooling round with the computer, it now works fine. PIctures I have printed out have been of good quality, especially on the glossy picture paper. The e-print is a good feature, as now my daughter sends pictures directly to my printer and it prints them out automatically.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Quality Construction; Easy to Use; Efficient; Easy To Set Up
I normally don't write reviews but I had to about this printer! This is amazing! I upgraded from a $30 deskjet F300 to this printer because I was sick of going through ink so quickly and because I wanted to upgrade to a wireless printer. I ordered the 5514e and I couldn't be happier!! It's easy to set up, it prints amazingly clear for an inkjet printer, and I LOVE LOVE LOVE the automatic dual sided printing it does. It definitely saves on paper! I have yet to see if my ink lasts any longer than my old printer, since I've only had this for about a week, but I must say that I'm glad I purchased this product. Yet another quality product from HP. LOVE IT!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States

I especially like the E-PRINT FEATURE FOR REMOTE PRINTING. It has only been in limited use for 2 weeks but so far all is well.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: Opened the box, followed the instructions, used the installation cd on laptops and desktop, also installed HP print apps on 2 iphones, 2 ipads and 1 ipod touch 4th gen. All devices worked via eprint or airprint immediately without any problems. It is the perfect HOME printer for a family with 2 teenagers- report printing, coupon printing, pic printing. The price was perfect since this printer was on sale and then we had an additional 5% off. Shipping was quick and product came in perfect condition via Fedex.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: This printer was really easy to set up. The instructions were very clear. I just plugged the computer in and followed the steps. The printer found the wireless network and got an IP address, which was available on the printer's touch screen. Within a few minutes I was printing from all 3 of the wireless computers in my house. I haven't tried the scanner yet - except for the alignment test, which scans in a printed copy to align the printer.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: It took all of 20 minutes to get every feature operational. Both ePrint and Airprint work flawlessly. My only caveat is the picture quality is not as good as my HP8100. But, the HP8100 has 6 inks, so it was not a suprise. The BEST PART is I can print from my iPhone and iPad using airprint on my LAN and ANY WiFi via email. Can print with my MacbookPro, too. It's portable and comes with a carrying bag. A real GEM!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: I bought this printer because of it's e print capability! Works great! Small footprint, low profile, easy set up and nice print quality. I can not comment on ink usage because I have not had it long enough and we all know that is a big (and expensive) issue!

I had a cheap printer that came with my computer and I had an older printer on another computer.Finally found the printer I wanted and its so much better.I use it for every thing.Makes great photos too.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: I haven't gotten to use all of Darlene's (my printer's name) features yet but I like what I've been able to do so far. I really love that she can print wirelessly--I think that is my favorite feature. I definately love Darlene!

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.Review: I wish this printer could scan to email or Google Docs. I'm running on a Chromebox 3, which was my reason for purchasing this printer. There's no local storage on a Chromebox so, unfortunately, I didn't do enough homework before my purchase.

Item.Item: HP Photosmart 5514 e-All-in-One B111h Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Portuguese, Spanish / Canada, Latin America, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: very easy to set up and great value for price
Item.Review:
Pros: simple set up--plug in and go
Cons: loud when getting ready to print
I have not tried to print a picture yet but the quality of document printing couldn't be better. Very happy with purchase!
